signets.name: Blessing of Grey Falcon
signets.description: Restore SP per second. Scatter barrier enables Combo ATK

signets.name: Blessing of Phantom Plumes
signets.description: After using support, tapping ATK triggers QTE

signets.description: Restore SP per second. Scatter barrier enables Combo ATK

signets.description: After using support, tapping ATK triggers QTE

signets.name: Blessing of Sheen
signets.description: Ultimates do not suspend Astrum consumption

signets.name: Blessing of Heatflow
signets.description: Black hole deals bonus fire DMG

signets.name: Goblet of the Giver
signets.description: Ultimate boosts Total DMG by 35% for 5s

signets.name: Pendant of the Watcher
signets.description: Ultimate boosts Physical DMG by 30% for 5s

signets.name: Recitatif of Eden
signets.description: Every 10 SP left boosts Total DMG by 3.0%

signets.name: Recitatif of Creeks
signets.description: Every 10 SP left boosts Physical & Elemental DMG by 2.5%.

signets.name: Echo of Withered Soil
signets.description: After lasting over 7s, boost SP cap and restore SP/s till it ends

signets.name: Aria of Dawn
signets.description: Trigger Thunder Symphony after 3 Lightning of Aria bolts.

signets.name: Blade, Grave, and Scar
signets.description: Every 100 HP loss boosts Total DMG by 1.0%

signets.name: Bone, Blood, and Ribbon
signets.description: Every 100 HP loss boosts Physical & Elemental DMG by 0.8%
